name: 6 in 1 Racing Games Collection
summary: Six Ways to race, No Speed Limits, No Regrets

name: 6 Inch My Darling
summary: 6inch My Darling is a visual novel romance adventure originally released by KID for Sega Saturn with free for all rating, thus not including adult content. Half a year later, the game was released on PC platform by Airyu with added adult content and altered setting and story elements.

name: 6 in 1 Power Bundle Vol. 2
summary: Enjoy 6 games in 1 with this irresistible games pack!

name: 6 in 1 Power Bundle
summary: Enjoy 6 games in 1 with this irresistible games pack!

name: 6-in-1 IQ Scale Bundle
summary: We transform science into delightful gamesFor decades, researchers have created tasks that measure cognitive abilities. Weâ€™ve adapted some of these tasks and made some of our own, creating cognitive games. It makes you smarter!

name: 6-in-1 Board Game Club
summary: The Board Game Club collection containing 6 classic games including Chess, Backgammon, Checkers, Othello, Connect Four, and Ludo. Personalizing players and challenging built-in three levels of AI Players make it combines nonstop entertainment, endless replayability.

name: 6-in-1 IQ Scale Bundle: Cube Match
summary: The game is aimed at training the speed of reaction and thinking. There is a myth that the reaction rate is the same for all, but it is not. You can easily verify this. It is enough to pass the test to determine the speed of reaction with friends or relatives. You will notice that it is different.

name: 6-in-1 IQ Scale Bundle: Starships
summary: Peripheral vision refers to an area in which you can absorb visual information without moving your eyes. During the game you will be shown starships for a short time, and you will have to remember their quantity.

name: 6 in 1 Time Management Game Collection
summary: Collection of six time management games: Caveman Tales, Country Tales, Kingdom Tales, Kingdom Tales 2, Fate of the Pharaoh and Julie's Sweets. In Julie's Sweets, players run a restaurant and serve customers. In the other games, players must gather resources to construct buildings.

name: 6-in-1 IQ Scale Bundle: Lost Starships
summary: This game for the development of memory. The aim of the game is to remember the location of the starships and then indicate the missed.

name: 6ix9ine Runner
summary: 6ix9ine Runner is an arcade game in which you can play as the popular rapper Tekashi 6ix9ine and break blocks to the beat of his music. Listen to GOOBA, FEFE, TROLLZ, YAYA, or BEBE as you dodge traps and destroy blocks to reach the end of the level.
